approvalStep.description: Sets approvers and allows them to accept or reject the approval request.
approvalStep.label: Submit the opportunity for approval
approvalStep.name: Submit_for_approval

ApprovalProcess.description: Process responsible for submitting an opportunity for approval.

entryCriteria.formula: AND( of_opportunity_products__c > 0, OR( MRR_from_Products__c >= 0, AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Loss_Reason_Detail__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Primary_Loss_Reason__c)))) ), OR( ROUND(MRR__c,2) = Round(MRR_from_Products__c,2), AND( ISBLANK(MRR__c), MRR_from_Products__c = 0) ), OR( ROUND(One_off_from_Products__c, 2) = ROUND(One_off__c,2), AND( ISBLANK(One_off__c), One_off_from_Products__c = 0) ), OR( of_products_MRR__c = 0, AND( of_products_MRR__c > 0, NOT(ISBLANK(End_date_contract__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Startdate_contract__c)) ) ), OR( SOf__c = "San Mateo", SOf__c = "San Carlos", Customisation_Required__c = FALSE, AND( Customisation_Required__c = TRUE, NOT(ISBLANK(Due_Date_of_Customisations__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Product_Customisation_Required__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Product_Sign_Off_Owner__c)) ) ), OR( AND( OR( CONTAINS(TEXT(Type), "New Business"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer")), NOT(DAY(End_date_contract__c)=DAY(Startdate_contract__c)), OR( Opportunity_Competitor_Counter__c > 0 , Check_Opportunity_Competitor__c = "N/A"), OR( AND( OR(TEXT(Account.BillingCountryCode) <> "US", NOT(ISBLANK(Account.BillingState))), NOT(ISBLANK(Account.Bill_to_Contact_Email__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Account.BillingCity)), NOT(ISBLANK( Account.Billing_Account_Name__c )), NOT(ISBLANK(Account.BillingStreet)) ), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Account.OEM__c))) ), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Account.PO_Needed__c))), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Account.Database__c)), Platform__c = "Webdam"), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Main_Objective_1__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Main_Objective_2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Main_Objective_3__c))), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Account.OEM__c))), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Notice_period_months__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Invoice_period__c)) ) ), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Contract_Renewal_Term__c)), NOT(Contract_Renewal_Term__c = 0)), OR( SOf__c = "San Mateo", SOf__c = "San Carlos", ISPICKVAL(Solutions_Required__c, "No"), AND( ISPICKVAL(Solutions_Required__c,"Yes"), OR( AND(Out_of_the_box_Solution__c=TRUE,Customisation_Required__c=FALSE), AND(Out_of_the_box_Solution__c=FALSE,Customisation_Required__c=TRUE))) ), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Use_Case__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Primary_Win_Reason__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Win_Reason_Detail__c)) ), AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business - Internal Transfer")), OR(TEXT(Account.BillingCountryCode) <> "US", NOT(ISBLANK(Account.BillingState))), OR( SOf__c = "San Mateo", SOf__c = "San Carlos", One_off__c <= 0, ISBLANK(One_off__c), AND( One_off__c > 0, OR( ISPICKVAL(Solutions_Required__c, "No"), ISPICKVAL(Solutions_Required__c,"Yes") ) ) ) ), AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Upsell"),ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Professional Services")), OR( SOf__c = "San Mateo", SOf__c = "San Carlos", One_off__c <= 0, ISBLANK(One_off__c), AND( One_off__c > 0, OR( ISPICKVAL(Solutions_Required__c, "No"), AND( ISPICKVAL(Solutions_Required__c,"Yes"), OR( AND(Out_of_the_box_Solution__c=TRUE,Customisation_Required__c=FALSE), AND(Out_of_the_box_Solution__c=FALSE,Customisation_Required__c=TRUE))))) ) ) ), OR( Check_SFDC_Partnership_Details__c = "N/A", NOT(ISBLANK(Account.Marketing_Cloud_Org_ID__c)) ), CONTAINS( Check_DoA__c , "YES"), CONTAINS( Check_Account_Deployment__c , "YES"), OR( OR(NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Account.OEM__c))), AND( NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Type), "New Business")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Upsell")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Renewal")) )), Account.IsDecisionMakerandChampionadded__c=TRUE ) )
